categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Rebel camp was the base of operations of a Rebel Alliance commando unit that operated on the planet Kashyyyk, homeworld of the Wookiees. The camp was hidden on the Common Paths level of the dangerous Rryatt Trail.

As of 1.5 ABY, the camp consisted of a small guard tower, an unfinished reinforced wall and various tents. A T-65 X-wing starfighter was parked on a small hill next to the camp. The Rebels used a CLL-8 binary load lifter to move crates and heavy equipment around.
Right next to the camp one could find a small Wookiee burial ground.
